info.title: Tesa Cloud API
info.description: API access to the Tesa Cloud Digital Platform including patient information, surgery details, and patient-reported outcome survey data.

post.description: Fetches a paginated list of patients associated with the authenticated organization's API key.
Fetches the profile of a single patient by their Tesa Cloud patient ID.
Fetches a list of locations associated with the authenticated organization's API key.
Fetches a list of surgical procedure templates associated with the authenticated organization's API key.
Fetches a paginated list of appointments within a date range for the authenticated organization.
Fetches organisation details for the authenticated organization's API key.
Creates a new appointment for a patient.
Records tourniquet time for a procedure. Provide either start_time and end_time, or minutes directly.
Fetches active, unhidden notes for an appointment.
Fetches detailed procedure information by procedure ID and appointment ID.
Updates procedure details for a specific procedure.
Creates a new note for an appointment.
Fetches the post-op report PDF URL for an appointment.
Fetches survey responses for an appointment.
Creates a new patient observation record with height, weight, and other clinical measurements.
Fetches all observation records for a patient.

start_date.description: Start date for the date range filter (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date for the date range filter (ISO 8601 format)

total.description: Total number of appointments matching the filter

organisation_id.description: Organisation identifier (optional, defaults to API key's organisation)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the appointment was created

minutes.description: Tourniquet time in minutes (alternative to start/end times)

report_url.description: URL to the PDF report (may be GCS path requiring signing)

submission_date.description: When the survey response was submitted

days_since_appointment.description: Number of days between appointment and survey submission

associated_appointment_id.description: Optional appointment identifier to link observation

pre_op.description: Whether this is a pre-operative observation

injured_ligaments.description: List of injured ligaments (e.g., ACL, MCL, PCL, LCL)

pre_op.description: Whether this is a pre-operative observation
